data.title: All American Girl
data.meta_description: In the archived series of paintings, All American Girl, I am sharing my Asian American perspective. Through images of everyday objects, traditional symbols, and pop culture references, I address some of the stereotypes, expectations, and misconceptions that are based on physical appearance and cultural presumption. . . . . . . . Full Circle (She)…
data.text:
In the archived series of paintings, All American Girl, I am sharing my Asian American perspective.

Through images of everyday objects, traditional symbols, and pop culture references, I address some of the stereotypes, expectations, and misconceptions that are based on physical appearance and cultural presumption.

. . . . . . .

Full Circle (She)

2015. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 48 x 48 inches.

. . . . . .

Between the Lines

2013. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 48 x 48 inches.

. . . . . . .

Little People (Paper Doll)

2012. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 32 x 32 inches.

Private Collection

. . . . . . .

Someone Like You

2011. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 48 x 48 inches.

Private Collection

. . . . . . .

Look Alike

2010. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 48 x 48 inches.

Private Collection

. . . . . . .

Role Models

2010. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 48 x 48 inches.

Private Collection

. . . . . . .

Americanese: 180 Degrees

2009. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 40 x 38 inches.

Collection of the Colorado Springs Fine Arts Center

. . . . . . .

Foreign Accents

2008. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 48 x 48 inches.

Private Collection

. . . . . . .

A Gathering of Orientals

2007. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 32 x 60 inches.

Private Collection

. . . . . . .

Fortunate 4

2006. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 20 x 24 inches.

. . . . . . .

Asians and Orientals: Yellow on Red

2005. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 34 x 34 inches.

. . . . . . .

2004. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 27 x 26 inches.

. . . . . . .

. . . . . . .

Yellow (She)

2002. Oil and oil stick on canvas, 50 x 48 inches.
